item.title: License
item.description: krei can manage the license for your projects. Declarative API Standard Configuration import wtf.metio.krei.model.license.License; import wtf.metio.krei.template.LicenseTemplates; var projectName = "your-project"; var license = License.of(LicenseTemplates.CC0, projectName); configure LICENSE file configure AUTHORS/WAIVER file configure source file header configure README license section use provided project name for templating Custom Configuration import wtf.metio.krei.model.license.License; import wtf.metio.krei.model.license.Waiver; import java.nio.file.Paths; var projectName = "your-project"; var license = License.builder() .license("your license text") .licenseFile(Paths.get("/path/to/the/LICENSE/file")) .sourceHeader("your source file header") .

item.title: Maven
item.description: All Maven projects at https://github.com/metio adhere to a certain project setup/layout which includes: Use Creative Commons Zero license Create LICENSE Create AUTHORS/WAIVER Create README.md Create CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md Create CONTRIBUTING.md Create CHANGELOG.md Create .github/SECURITY.md Create .github/SUPPORT.md Create templates in .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ Create .github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/config.yml Create templates in .github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/ Create .github/workflows/release.yml Create Makefile Create pom.xml Use maven-build-process as Maven parent Configure IntelliJ Idea code style settings Configure IntelliJ Idea copyright settings Create docs folder with metio-hugo-theme as theme Initialize Git repository Setup local Git configuration Create .
